name: pdf-viewer-auth
description: PDF Viewer with Authentication & Credit System - Full Stack Application

scripts.backend-only: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python run.py
scripts.install-deps: npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
scripts.install-backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/venv && rm -rf frontend/node_modules && rm -rf venv && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.test-backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m pytest tests/ -v

author: Your Name
